We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Regional Sales Manager

Job Identification: 25023384

Job type:&nbsp;Full time (On-site)

	Are you an accomplished sales leader with a strong background in measurement instrumentation? Emerson is looking for a Sales Manager based in Lagos, Nigeria, who will be responsible for driving the sales and growth of Emerson&rsquo;s Flexim clamp-on ultrasonic flow meters within Nigeria and surrounding territories.
	In this role, you will be responsible for demand creation, project pursuit, finding opportunities with customers, business development and selling Flexim Flow meters to end users/EPCs in Nigeria, Ghana and Equatorial Guinea while collaborating closely with regional and global teams to meet or exceed business objectives.


In This Role, Your Responsibilities Will Be


	Sales &amp; Business Development: Lead sales engagements and project pursuits to meet or exceed Flexim bookings and revenue targets. Develop and implement territory growth strategies through direct sales and partner engagement. Identify and pursue key projects from conceptual to execution stages with EPCs and end users. 	Customer &amp; Partner Engagement: Build and maintain strong relationships with end users, engineering firms, and local business partners. 	Product Support &amp; Application Development: Conduct site demonstrations, field trials, and product trainings to increase customer adoption. Collaborate with internal experts to support complex opportunities and address customer challenges. Identify new applications, upgrade opportunities, and product gaps for future development.
	Collaboration &amp; Compliance: Work with proposal, CRM, and CPQ teams to ensure accurate and competitive offers. Ensure trade compliance and health &amp; safety adherence in all business practices. Collaborate with the Global Marketing Teams and other Emerson Business Units to generate white space opportunities and drive pull-through content.


Who You Are?


	You are a highly driven and customer-focused sales professional with strong technical and interpersonal skills.
	You enjoy developing strategic relationships, solving customer challenges with tailored solutions, and leading cross-functional collaboration to close business.


Requirements
For This Role, You Will Need:


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Engineering or Science.
	A minimum of 5 years of relevant experience in the sales of flow meters across the Oil &amp; Gas, Power, Chemicals, and Water Industries in Nigeria, Ghana, and Equatorial Guinea.
	Proven ability to manage complex sales cycles and large project pursuits.
	Strong communication, presentation, and negotiation skills.
	Ability to travel up to 75% within Nigeria and occasionally within West Africa.


Preferred Qualifications That Set You Apart:


	Solid understanding of various ultrasonic flow measurement technologies
	Experience in managing or working with cross-border sales teams
	Demonstrated success in technical solution selling in a matrix organization
	Strategic account development and partner management experience

Regional Sales Manager Job at Emerson  Automation Solutions




        
    

        
        Emerson is a global Technology and Engineering company providing innovative solutions for customers in industrial, commercial, and residential markets. Our Emerson Automation Solutions business helps process, hybrid, and discrete manufacturers maximize production, protect personnel and the environment while optimizing their energy and operating costs. Our Emerson Commercial and Residential Solutions business helps ensure human comfort and health, protect food quality and safety, advance energy efficiency, and create sustainable infrastructure.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Regional Sales Manager
     

            
    



Job Identification: 25023384
Job Location: Lagos
Job type: Full time (On-site)
Job Function: Field Sales

Job Summary


	Are you an accomplished sales leader with a strong background in measurement instrumentation? Emerson is looking for a Sales Manager based in Lagos, Nigeria, who will be responsible for driving the sales and growth of Emerson’s Flexim clamp-on ultrasonic flow meters within Nigeria and surrounding territories.
	In this role, you will be responsible for demand creation, project pursuit, finding opportunities with customers, business development and selling Flexim Flow meters to end users/EPCs in Nigeria, Ghana and Equatorial Guinea while collaborating closely with regional and global teams to meet or exceed business objectives.


In This Role, Your Responsibilities Will Be


	Sales & Business Development: Lead sales engagements and project pursuits to meet or exceed Flexim bookings and revenue targets. Develop and implement territory growth strategies through direct sales and partner engagement. Identify and pursue key projects from conceptual to execution stages with EPCs and end users. Maintain an accurate opportunity pipeline and provide monthly Flexim sales forecasts to management.
	Customer & Partner Engagement: Build and maintain strong relationships with end users, engineering firms, and local business partners. Interpret technical specifications and recommend optimal Flexim solutions. Drive strategic account development initiatives, including technology acceptance and product approvals.
	Product Support & Application Development: Conduct site demonstrations, field trials, and product trainings to increase customer adoption. Collaborate with internal experts to support complex opportunities and address customer challenges. Identify new applications, upgrade opportunities, and product gaps for future development.
	Collaboration & Compliance: Work with proposal, CRM, and CPQ teams to ensure accurate and competitive offers. Ensure trade compliance and health & safety adherence in all business practices. Collaborate with the Global Marketing Teams and other Emerson Business Units to generate white space opportunities and drive pull-through content.


Who You Are?


	You are a highly driven and customer-focused sales professional with strong technical and interpersonal skills.
	You enjoy developing strategic relationships, solving customer challenges with tailored solutions, and leading cross-functional collaboration to close business.


Requirements
For This Role, You Will Need:


	Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering or Science.
	A minimum of 5 years of relevant experience in the sales of flow meters across the Oil & Gas, Power, Chemicals, and Water Industries in Nigeria, Ghana, and Equatorial Guinea.
	Proven ability to manage complex sales cycles and large project pursuits.
	Strong communication, presentation, and negotiation skills.
	Ability to travel up to 75% within Nigeria and occasionally within West Africa.


Preferred Qualifications That Set You Apart:


	Solid understanding of various ultrasonic flow measurement technologies
	Experience in managing or working with cross-border sales teams
	Demonstrated success in technical solution selling in a matrix organization
	Strategic account development and partner management experience

Legal Executive Job at Global Profilers




        
    

        
        Global Profilers, a Profiler Group Company, is a global recruitment and resourcing company with a focus on African markets. We are experienced working within numerous fields such as: Telecom, IEC, Infra 25, Oil & Gas, Mining, Financial Services and Banking, FMCG/CD, Education and Agriculture to name a few.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Legal Executive
Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

What You’ll Do
     

            
    




	Draft, review & manage telecom, vendor & partner agreements.
	Guide the business on corporate governance, compliance & legal risks.
	Liaise with regulatory bodies, external counsel & internal teams.
	Monitor and enforce legal frameworks & corporate policies.
	Provide quick, practical advice on evolving Nigerian laws.


What Makes You the Right Fit


	LLB with NYSC completion.
	2+ years of legal experience, preferably in telecommunications.
	Strong knowledge of corporate law, intellectual property & compliance.
	Sharp analytical mind, ethical judgment & persuasive communication.
	Able to handle sensitive matters with discretion & urgency.


Why Join Us?


	Because your expertise won’t sit in a file — it will shape decisions, protect the brand, and drive growth.
	On-site with occasional external engagements.


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 per month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: falade@globalprofilers.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
